name: Lego game For Pros.
description:
Lego game For Pros.

What is this game about?

You need to collect the power-ups and dodge the enemies. This game is also a platformer game which is 3D.

Platforms:

Windows only  - Windows 10 or newer.

Will this game get updates:

No, as I want to move onto other projects.
Recommended:

You need DirectX 11, 4 GB of RAM and 2GB of free space.

Any feedback would be great.

This game is terrible but still sharing it lol.

Thanks, Jonathan Steadman.
